result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mauricio E Maldonado

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court.  Prosecuting attorney Natalie M. Mulvey in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant wishes to obtain counsel. 
Present bond continued
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court.  Prosecuting attorney Tim Greenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant has not obtained attorney as of this date.
Defendant states cannot hire his own attorney.
Defendant advised or procedure to obtain court appointed counsel and given form in open court. 
Present bond continued
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court.  Prosecuting attorney David L Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Present bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Assistant District Attorney Natalie Mulvey appears on behalf of the State. Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court without counsel. Defendant to bring Court appointed Counsel paperwork to court next time if he is unable to retain counsel. Present bond continued
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prosecuting attorney Natalie M. Mulvey in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court. 
Present bond continued
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
No contact provision with N.M.B. lifted.

Prosecuting attorney Ryan M Spaude in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Victim does not appear.
Case recalled at 10:10
Prosecuting attorney M.  Hillman in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Victim N.B. appears
Court lifts no contact order with N.M.B.

Defendant bonded out and already paid cash bond of $150 at Brown County jail. 
Defendant to have no contact with N.M.B. or their residence or place of employment.
Defendant to possess no firearms or dangerous weapons. 
Absolute sobriety.

Prosecuting attorney Ryan M Spaude in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mauricio E Maldonado in court.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
